articles.title: Bus and armoured truck collision kills 20 in South Africa - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: At least 60 others were injured in the incident that happened on Monday in South Africa’s northern Limpopo province.
articles.content:
A head-on collision between a tour bus and a cash-in-transit truck left 20 people dead and left at least 60 others injured late on Monday on a major road in South Africas northern Limpopo province.
